# Set up

Open csv:
```{r}
climate_land_abund = read.csv(
  "~/Desktop/clim_land_arthropods/final_dat.csv")
```

Load packages:
```{r}
library(arm)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(MuMIn)
library(polypoly)
library(psych)
library(performance)
library(car)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
climate_land_abund <-
  climate_land_abund %>%
  dplyr::select(-X)
```

# Analysis

## A01. Pollinators, ts_poll_gen_flight_noncrop

### Data frames

#### 100 m

Data frame:
```{r}
climate_land_abund_A01_100 <-
  climate_land_abund %>%
  filter(Pollinator_study == 1) %>%
  dplyr::select(
    ts_poll_gen_flight_noncrop_abund_scaled,
    semi_100,
    edge_100,
    arable_100,
    min_precip,
    max_precip,
    TAP,
    min_temp,
    max_temp,
    MAT,
    StudyID_yr,
    Sampling_method,
    Block,
    Latitude,
    Longitude
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  poly_add_columns(semi_100, degree = 2, prefix = "semi_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(edge_100, degree = 2, prefix = "edge_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(arable_100, degree = 2, prefix = "arable_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(min_precip, degree = 2, prefix = "min_precip_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(max_precip, degree = 2, prefix = "max_precip_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(TAP, degree = 2, prefix = "TAP_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(MAT, degree = 2, prefix = "MAT_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(min_temp, degree = 2, prefix = "min_temp_") %>%
  poly_add_columns(max_temp, degree = 2, prefix = "max_temp_") %>%
  mutate(
    ts_A01_l = log(ts_poll_gen_flight_noncrop_abund_scaled + 1),
    semi_1_l = log(semi_1 + 1),
    semi_2_l = log(semi_2 + 1),
    edge_1_l = log(edge_1 + 1),
    edge_2_l = log(edge_2 + 1),
    arable_1_l = log(arable_1 + 1),
    arable_2_l = log(arable_2 + 1),
    TAP_1_l = log(TAP_1 + 1),
    TAP_2_l = log(TAP_2 + 1),
    min_precip_1_l = log(min_precip_1 + 1),
    min_precip_2_l = log(min_precip_2 + 1),
    max_precip_1_l = log(max_precip_1 + 1),
    max_precip_2_l = log(max_precip_2 + 1),
    MAT_1_l = log(MAT_1 + 1),
    MAT_2_l = log(MAT_2 + 1),
    min_temp_1_l = log(min_temp_1 + 1),
    min_temp_2_l = log(min_temp_2 + 1),
    max_temp_1_l = log(max_temp_1 + 1),
    max_temp_2_l = log(max_temp_2 + 1)
  )
```

### Null models

#### 100-500 m

```{r}
mod_singular1_A01_100 <- lmer(
    ts_A01_l ~
        1 +
        (1 | StudyID_yr) +
        (1 | StudyID_yr:Sampling_method) +
        (1 | StudyID_yr:Sampling_method:Block),
    data = climate_land_abund_A01_100,
    na.action = "na.fail"
)
mod_singular2_A01_100 <- lmer(
  ts_A01_l ~
    1 +
        (1 | StudyID_yr) +
        # (1 | StudyID_yr:Sampling_method) +
        (1 | StudyID_yr:Sampling_method:Block),
  data = climate_land_abund_A01_100,
  na.action = "na.fail"
)
mod_singular3_A01_100 <- lmer(
    ts_A01_l ~
        1 +
        (1 | StudyID_yr) +
        (1 | StudyID_yr:Sampling_method),
        # (1 | StudyID_yr:Sampling_method:Block),
    data = climate_land_abund_A01_100,
    na.action = "na.fail"
)
mod_singular4_A01_100 <- lmer(
    ts_A01_l ~
        1 +
        (1 | StudyID_yr),
        # (1 | StudyID_yr:Sampling_method) +
        # (1 | StudyID_yr:Sampling_method:Block),
    data = climate_land_abund_A01_100,
    na.action = "na.fail"
)
isSingular(mod_singular1_A01_100)
isSingular(mod_singular2_A01_100)
isSingular(mod_singular3_A01_100)
isSingular(mod_singular4_A01_100)
```

```{r}
model.sel(
  # mod_singular1_A01_100,
  mod_singular2_A01_100,
  # mod_singular3_A01_100,
  mod_singular4_A01_100
)
```

```{r}
ci_mod6.3_A01_100 <-confint(mod6.3_A01_100, 
                         nsim = 999,
                         seed = 18,
                         method = "boot")

  ci_mod6.3_A01_100 %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  mutate(model = 6.3)

ci_mod19.3_A01_100 <-confint(mod19.3_A01_100, 
                         nsim = 999,
                         seed = 18,
                         method = "boot")
ci_mod19.3_A01_100 <-
  ci_mod19.3_A01_100 %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  mutate(model = 19.3)

citable_A01_100 <- rbind(
  ci_mod6.3_A01_100,
  ci_mod19.3_A01_100
)

citable_A01_100 <-
  citable_A01_100 %>%
  rename("100_2.5%" = "2.5 %",
         "100_97.5%" = "97.5 %")

citable_A01_100 <- citable_A01_100 %>%
  rownames_to_column(var = "term") %>%
  mutate(term = str_replace(term, 'z.', '')) %>%
  mutate(term = str_replace(term, '_l\\d', '_l'))
```

```{r}
citable_A01 <- citable_A01 %>%
  mutate(
    significant_100 = case_when(
      `100_2.5%` > 0 & `100_97.5%` > 0 |
        `100_2.5%` < 0 & `100_97.5%` < 0 ~ "yes",
    `100_2.5%` <= 0 & `100_97.5%` >= 0 |
      `100_2.5%` >= 0 & `100_97.5%` <= 0 ~ "no",
    .default = NA),
    significant_250 = case_when(
      `250_2.5%` > 0 & `250_97.5%` > 0 |
        `250_2.5%` < 0 & `250_97.5%` < 0 ~ "yes",
    `250_2.5%` <= 0 & `250_97.5%` >= 0 |
      `250_2.5%` >= 0 & `250_97.5%` <= 0 ~ "no",
    .default = NA),
    significant_500 = case_when(
      `500_2.5%` > 0 & `500_97.5%` > 0 |
        `500_2.5%` < 0 & `500_97.5%` < 0 ~ "yes",
    `500_2.5%` <= 0 & `500_97.5%` >= 0 |
      `500_2.5%` >= 0 & `500_97.5%` <= 0 ~ "no",
    .default = NA),
    significant_1000 = case_when(

    `1000_2.5%` <= 0 & `1000_97.5%` >= 0 |

    .default = NA),
    significant_2000 = case_when(
      `2000_2.5%` > 0 & `2000_97.5%` > 0 |
        `2000_2.5%` < 0 & `2000_97.5%` < 0 ~ "yes",
    `2000_2.5%` <= 0 & `2000_97.5%` >= 0 |
```
